name: .R
description: .R is a system resource viewer for Android developers. The following resources are supported. * android.R.drawable * android.R.color * android.R.dimen * android.R.string * android.R.style.Theme* * android.R.layout.*list_item* * android.R.array  This software has the following features. * No advertisement * Open source ( http://sourceforge.jp/users/say/pf/android_R/scm/ )
